It sure does. I was 19 when I was diagnosed. There's nothing more discouraging than going to the hospital and being the only patient under 40. If I wasn't bald nobody would've thought I was a patient because I looked totally normally and healthy. Man that was such an awful time in my life. Luckily I'm cancer free now but it pains me to even think about that time in my life. Unless you've been through a life threatening disease you can't imagine the psychological and physical pain and suffering that comes with it. Lord have mercy it's such a horrible thing that I wouldn't wish upon my worst enemy

That chart isn't 100% correct.
4 tech = head up on tackle 5 tech = outside shoulder of tackle 4I = inside shoulder of tackle

5 tech is not head up with the tackle. A 5 tech is on the outside shoulder of the tackle. A 4 tech is head up.
Even numbers = head up Odd numbers = shade
